bibl.title: The Two Egyptian Birth Days of Augustus.
bibl.note: Complément à: IDEM, The Early Augustan Calendars in Rome and Egypt, ZPE 142 (2003) pp. 221-240, 4 tabl.; - The Early Augustan Calendars in Rome and Egypt: Addenda et Corrigenda, ZPE 147 (2004) pp. 165-168. - Augustus was born on 23 September 63 B.C.(Roman calendar). At different times, his birth day was marked on two days of Egyptian months: the 25th and the 27th.
bibl.seg: BENNETT Chris, The Two Egyptian Birth Days of Augustus.

Complément à: IDEM, The Early Augustan Calendars in Rome and Egypt, ZPE 142 (2003) pp. 221-240, 4 tabl.; - The Early Augustan Calendars in Rome and Egypt: Addenda et Corrigenda, ZPE 147 (2004) pp. 165-168. - Augustus was born on 23 September 63 B.C.(Roman calendar). At different times, his birth day was marked on two days of Egyptian months: the 25th and the 27th.
